desc.en: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.jp: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.thai: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.ko: In the abandoned factory, the Game Development Department finds a humanoid robot by the name of Aris. For the sake of the club, Momoi brings Aris back to their club room to induct her as a new member.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，愛麗絲。桃井为了阻止遊戲開發部被废社，于是便把愛麗絲带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃井为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部一行人，在废弃工厂遇到长得像人类的机器人少女，爱丽丝。桃为了阻止游戏开发部被废社，于是便把爱丽丝带到社团活动室，打算让她成为社团成员。

desc.en: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.
desc.jp: The three ran into the factory and found no robots continuing chasing them. Right at the moment, the facility's built-in system began identifying them and recognized Sensei, granting them permission to proceed. They dropped to the bottom thanks to the door opened at the floor.

desc.zh_tw: 三人跑进了工厂里，发现机器人不再跟随。就在这时，设施里的系统开始识别三人身份，并认出了老师，给三人发放了通行权限。三人从地板打开的门掉了下去。

desc.en: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.
desc.jp: In one sinkhole, the three found Aris who was asleep, as well as some text like "AL-1S". Momoi took pity on her and decided to take her back to Millennium. She also gave her own clothes for Aris to wear on. Aris woke up right after the interaction with Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的愛麗絲，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。綠可怜愛麗絲，便决定将她带回千年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，愛麗絲因与老师接触而醒了过来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 三人在废墟的一个天坑里发现了睡着着的爱丽丝，发现了“AL-1S”之类的字样。绿可怜爱丽丝，便决定将她带回千禧年，还给她穿上了自己的衣服。就在这时，爱丽丝因与老师接触而醒了过来。

desc.en: Momoi took Aris back to the club room and Midori was shocked. Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. Momoi then revealed her plan: she wanted to let Aris pretend to be a student at here, solving the club member number problem.

Knowing barely anything, Aris started tossing the stuffs in the club room, like putting controllers and game consoles into month. desc.zh_tw: 桃井将愛麗絲带回到社团活动室，綠非常惊诧。愛麗絲因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让愛麗絲伪装成千年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井将爱丽丝带回到社团活动室，绿非常惊诧。爱丽丝因为不懂，开始乱动社团的东西，比如把手柄和游戏机塞进嘴里之类。桃井随后说出了自己的计划：她想让爱丽丝伪装成千禧年的学生加入社团，解决人数不够被废社的问题。

desc.en: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...
desc.jp: The Game Development Department makes it to a rundown factory. As if by instinct, Aris is drawn to the computer which contains G.BIBLE. She's able to download the data onto her gaming device...

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。愛麗絲在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部一行人抵达目的地——位于废墟的工厂。爱丽丝在那里靠直觉找到储存<G.Bible>的电脑，并且成功把资料下载到游戏机里。

desc.en: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.jp: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.thai: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.ko: Everyone made the way to the factory. Aris suddenly remembered something and went away on her own. They followed Aris and found a computer running a system called "Divi: Sion".
desc.zh_tw: 众人到达了工厂，但愛麗絲却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着愛麗絲，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 众人到达了工厂，但爱丽丝却突然记起了什么，自顾自的行动。众人跟随着爱丽丝，找到了一台搭载着“Divi: Sion”系统的电脑。

desc.en: The computer recognized Aris but was about to shut down due to low battery, with data on board going to be lost as well. To get the G.Bible saved on it, Momoi gave away her game console and her game saves. At last the data was secured, but it required a password to access. Momoi complained loudly and unintentionally attracted the robots.

desc.zh_tw: 电脑认出了愛麗絲，但突然电量不足即将关机，数据被毁在即；为了得到其存储的《G.Bible》，桃井献出了自己的游戏机与存档。数据得以保存，但需密码才可访问；桃井大声抱怨，结果引来了机器人。

desc.en: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.jp: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.thai: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.ko: Himari is imprisoned by Rio, and the two are still unable to find common ground. Meanwhile, after infiltrating Eridu to rescue Aris, the Game Development Department and the Engineering Department encounter an AMAS built by Rio.
desc.zh_tw: 被莉音监禁的陽葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救愛麗絲的遊戲開發部和工程師部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 被莉音监禁的阳葵。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程师部遇见了莉音创造的AMAS。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 被莉央监禁的日鞠。两人依旧走在平行在线。另一方面，潜入埃里都拯救爱丽丝的游戏开发部和工程部遇见了莉央创造的AMAS。

desc.en: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.jp: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.thai: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.ko: The C&C members blast their way through the AMAS as planned, but their relentless determination is stopped by none other than the C&C's fifth member, Toki.
desc.zh_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_jp: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员时阻止了势如破竹的他们。
desc.zh_cn_tw: C&C的成员们依照作战华丽地击倒了AMAS。C&C的第五个成员季阻止了势如破竹的他们。

desc.en: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.jp: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.

desc.ko: Himari was sick of the fact that Rio kidnapped Aris just to destroy her halo. Rio still hoped that Himari could understand her, and said it does no difference for her however they resist. Meantime, the security system of the city had discovered Sensei and the others.
desc.zh_tw: 陽葵对莉音将愛麗絲绑架回来并破坏光环一事感到恶心。莉音则仍希望陽葵能理解她，并表示陽葵和老师等人的反抗毫无意义。通讯间隙，都市的检测系统已经发现了老师一行人。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.en: The Engineering Department, Game Development Department and Sensei arrived at the city's underground freight passage safely, and was surprised to witness the ability that Veritas possessed. Right at this moment a group of AMAS blocked their way and they started engaging.

desc.en: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.jp: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.thai: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.ko: Contrary to Toki's prediction that Neru would try to rescue Aris on her own, she is faced with the whole of C&C in a ferocious battle. Meanwhile, the Game Development Department blasts their way through every AMAS one by one while making their way to the tower where Aris is located.
desc.zh_tw: 季原以为寧瑠会独自去拯救愛麗絲，包含寧瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。遊戲開發部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 时原以为尼禄会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含尼禄在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 季原以为宁瑠会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含宁瑠在内的所有C&C成员都开始和季交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 时原以为妮露会独自去拯救爱丽丝，包含妮露在内的所有C&C成员都开始和时交战。游戏开发部一一击败了AMAS的成员，并且前往埃里都的中心。

desc.en: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.jp: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.thai: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.ko: Toki said she had already known the plan and advised them not to resist anyone. But C&C pretended not understanding it and continued attacking. Between the gaps, Toki explained C&C's operation plan arrogantly, believing that Neru would be with Sensei; but it was far away from the fact.
desc.zh_tw: 季表示自己已经完全掌握了老师和C&C这边的行动，奉劝C&C不要再做无谓抵抗。但C&C佯装不懂，继续发起攻击。间隙，季傲慢地向C&C解析了他们的行动计划，认为寧瑠会随老师一起；但这并非事实。

desc.en: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.
desc.jp: The Game Development Department arrives at Rio's location and are about to rescue Aris when an unknown being, Key, appears and takes control of Eridu. The results are catastrophic. Rio belatedly tries to sacrifice herself in an attempt to rectify the situation when Noa and Yuuka arrive.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部抵达莉音所在的地方，在准备救出愛麗絲的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉音准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和優香出现了。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部抵达莉央所在的地方，在准备救出爱丽丝的瞬间，未来的存在「Key」出现且掌控了埃里都，局势因此开始步向危机。就在莉央准备牺牲自己来挽回一切时，乃爱和优香出现了。

desc.en: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.jp: Rio showed up and said she was lost already. Despite this, Rio still warned Sensei about the dangers that Aris could bring. But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.

But Sensei thought that Rio was acting too recklessly and didn't talk to others about these - basically the same with Himari. Meanwhile, Chihiro confirmed Aris' location, and the three rescued her in no time.
desc.zh_tw: 莉音出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉音仍然试图警告老师愛麗絲将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉音的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与陽葵的意思基本一致。千尋此时也确认了愛麗絲的具体位置，三人立刻将愛麗絲救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 莉音出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉音仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉音的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与阳葵的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉央出现，表示自己已经输了。尽管如此，莉央仍然试图警告老师爱丽丝将会带来的危险，但老师认为莉央的举动仍过于鲁莽，不与他人讨论而自主行动，与日鞠的意思基本一致。千寻此时也确认了爱丽丝的具体位置，三人立刻将爱丽丝救了出来。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.
desc.jp: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 莉央是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 莉音是千年科学学院研讨会的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件发生后引咎辞职。她是Eridu，一个被建造用来抵御基沃托斯威胁的城市的创造者。

school.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール

desc.en: What everyone embraced was not Aris, but rather another being, which was called Key. Aris' personality was isolated in the deep databases by Key, and it was Key acting right now. Key disconnected the comm and hacked Eridu, trying to make the city for her use; the army of Divi: Sion started gathering within the city. Rio apologized for her doings, and requested Sensei to leave before Key ever finished it, trying to stop it on her own. At that urgent moment, Yuuka intervened just in time and disconnected the power of Key, forcing it to stop.

desc.zh_tw: 众人迎来的不是愛麗絲，而是一个名叫“Key”的个体。愛麗絲的人格被Key隔离在深层数据库中，当前是Key正在行使职责。Key断开了通讯信号，并入侵了埃里都，试图为其所用；Divi:Sion的兵力也开始集中在都市中。莉音为自己的所作所为道歉，要求老师在Key得逞前离开，试图以自己阻止一切过程。就在千钧一发之际，優香等人及时插手断开了电源，Key发生错误而无法得逞。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.en: The Game Development Department and Sensei finally find Aris. Calling herself a demon lord, Aris is hesitant to return for fear of hurting others. Encouraged by everyone's supportive words that it's up to her to decide who she wants to be, Aris finally draws the proof of a warrior: Supernova, the Sword of Light.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部和老师终于遇见愛麗絲了。愛麗絲说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是愛麗絲终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部和老师终于遇见爱丽丝了。爱丽丝说自己是魔王，自己会害大家受伤，因此犹豫是否该回去。但大家都说自己才是自己真正的主人，于是爱丽丝终于拔出了勇者的证明「光之剑：Supernova」。

desc.en: Sensei ang the GDD arrived at the Aris' deep consciousness, and there they met Aris and Key. The GDD wanted to bring back Aris, but Key appeared suddenly and reminded "princess" of what she had witnessed.

desc.zh_tw: 老师和遊戲開發部一行人来到了愛麗絲的意识深处，在那他们见到了愛麗絲与Key。开发部想要带愛麗絲回去，但Key突然出现，并重新提醒“公主”她所见到的一切。

desc.en: On screen, it showed scenes of C&C being besieged by AMAS, Neru confronting Toki, Sensei and others confronting Avant Guard but short on hands, Neru collapsing after being serverly injured - nothing but all their combat scenes. Everyone didn't understand why, but Key said that the "princess" had already knew it herself.

desc.zh_tw: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与季对峙的寧瑠、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、寧瑠负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的尼禄、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、尼禄负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 画面上出现了被AMAS围攻的C&C、与时对峙的妮露、面对前卫君不知所措的老师众人、妮露负伤严重倒下的情景——都是他们战斗的身影。众人不解画面的内容，而Key则故作简单的表示，“公主”自己知道这一切。

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.en: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. She remembered the damage she inflicted on Momoi, the scenes of Midori and Yuzu confronting Rio, and Neru being injured - all was caused by herself, and so she should disappear.
desc.jp: Aris thought about Rio. Aris still held no doubts against the fact that she was in fact a "demon lord", and feared that she would inflict damages on everyone again. desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲想起了莉音。愛麗絲仍对自己是个“魔王”的概念自信不疑，害怕自己会再次给大家造成伤害。她记得自己给桃井造成的伤害，柚子和綠面对莉音时的情形，以及寧瑠前辈负伤的画面——而这全都是她自己造成的，也因此她应当消失。

desc.en: Momoi suddenly mentioned TSC2 made by everyone and its achievements like winning the Millenium Prize. Momoi didn't believe Aris' sayings, but she believed these facts, believing that Aris was not like that, and stressed the role of Aris in the team. Aris still couldn't understand why they would come to rescue her, and Yuzu pointed it out sharply: just like Aris had said before, the hero would not give up companions. They also mentioned that, no matter "demon lord" or "hero" she may be, they were nothing but only titles, and choosing to be which could only be decided by Aris.

desc.zh_tw: 桃井突然提到了愛麗絲与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信愛麗絲说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信愛麗絲绝非如此，强调了愛麗絲在团队中的作用。愛麗絲仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：愛麗絲自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有愛麗絲能决定。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃井突然提到了爱丽丝与大家制作的TSC2，提到了它斩获了千禧年大赏的种种成就。桃井不相信爱丽丝说的话，但她相信这些事实，相信爱丽丝绝非如此，强调了爱丽丝在团队中的作用。爱丽丝仍对所有人来拯救她而不解，而柚子则一针见血的指了出来：爱丽丝自己都说过，勇者绝不会放弃同伴。同时他们还提到，无论是魔王还是勇者都只是称号与头衔，真正想成为谁只有爱丽丝能决定。

desc.en: Everyone wanted to hear Aris' own true words. Being accused as a "demon lord", Aris thought that she would not be able to return to the club, to live and go out adventures with others - but Sensei denied it. Aris hesitated a little, said that she wanted to be a hero, that she dreamed of continuing adventures with GDD and Sensei. Everyone agreed and just said: "Of course. Because we are the Game Development Department!"

desc.zh_tw: 大家都想听听愛麗絲的真心话。愛麗絲因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。愛麗絲犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与遊戲開發部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，遊戲開發部啊！”
desc.zh_cn_jp: 大家都想听听爱丽丝的真心话。爱丽丝因自己已经被冠以“魔王”的身份，自己认定自己无法再回到社团、与大家冒险生活——但老师否定了这一点。爱丽丝犹豫了一下，说出自己也想成为勇者，与游戏开发部和老师将冒险继续下去的梦想。而众人则表示——“因为我们可是，游戏开发部啊！”

desc.en: Encouraged by everyone, Aris pulled out the Sword of Light stuck in the stone, returning to be a hero. Key looked at Aris in astonishment, hoping that Aris could perform her duties as the "princess". Aris didn't listen, and blew up Key with her Sword of Light.

desc.en: Key is another personality that exists within Aris' database. It was designed to help the "Princess", i.e. Aris, to destroy Kivotos. In Volume 2, Key was activated after interacting with the remains of Divi: Sion; in Volume Final, Aris requested help from Key but got destroyed in the progress, and Key sacrificed herself in exchange of Aris' revival. The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

The last known copy is stored on Momoi's game console that carries G.BIBLE, but the status of the G.BIBLE remains unknown after all the events.

desc.zh_tw: Key是愛麗絲資料庫中的另一個人格，其最先是用來指引“王女”（即愛麗絲）摧毀基沃託斯的存在。在主線第二篇中，Key在與Divi:Sion軍隊的殘骸觸碰後被啟用；在最終章中，愛麗絲向Key請求幫助，但過程中卻被摧毀，Key一命換一命，將愛麗絲復活。已知的最後一份複製儲存在桃井承載著G.BIBLE的遊戲機上，但在經歷這麼多事件後，G.BIBLE出於未知狀態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: Key是爱丽丝数据库中的另一个人格，其最先是用来指引“王女”（即爱丽丝）摧毁基沃托斯的存在。在主线第二篇中，Key在与Divi:Sion军队的残骸触碰后被激活；在最终章中，爱丽丝向Key请求帮助，但过程中却被摧毁，Key一命换一命，将爱丽丝复活。已知的最后一份拷贝存储在桃井承载着G.BIBLE的游戏机上，但在经历这么多事件后，G.BIBLE出于未知状态。

desc.en: As Key was suppressed in Aris' consciousness, the Divi: Sion army in the city began to disappear, and the Eridu control center was back at normal. Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.

Rio was surprised that Sensei and the GDD actually did it, but Sensei only replied that, it was something that GDD could make. Eventually, the three at GDD reunited with Aris.

desc.zh_tw: 由于愛麗絲意识中的Key被压制，城中的Divi:Sion军队开始消失，埃里都控制中心也恢复正常。莉音惊讶于老师等人居然真的做到了，而老师只是轻描淡写地表示这是遊戲開發部所能做到的。最终，遊戲開發部三人与愛麗絲团聚。

desc.en: The ending song of the short animation "beautiful day dreamer" about the Game Development Department, sung by the fours of the GDD. The song has two versions, one is two-minute long and the other one is four; the former is used at the end of both the animation and the Episode 25, Chapter 2, Volume 2 in-game.

desc.zh_cn: 官方游戏开发部短篇动画《beautiful day dreamer》中的片尾曲，由游戏开发部四人演唱。该歌曲由两分钟及四分钟两个版本，其中前者用于动画末尾曲与游戏内第二篇第二章的结尾曲。

desc.en: Rio is the former president of Seminar of Millennium Science School, who resigned after the incidents happened in Volume 2. She is the creator of the Eridu City, a fortress city designed to prevent crisis against Kivotos.

desc.zh_tw: 莉音是千年科學學院研討會的前主席，其在第二篇中的事件發生後引咎辭職。她是Eridu，一個被建造用來抵禦基沃託斯威脅的城市的創造者。
